name: "Mother" Japanese Trio in French Pear scent
description:
Here we have lovely Japanese-made trio with "Mother" in gold script on the cup, saucer and matching plate, complimented by yellow florals.

This vintage teacup candle trio is available in the fresh and delicious French Pear scent.

It will burn for approximately 30 hours with proper trimming of the wick.

Soy wax burns cleanly and has a better scent throw than other waxes. It also cleans up with hot soapy water so you can re-use the vintage teacup once its finished filling your home with a beautiful scent.

Ideal for a gift, a wedding favour or centrepiece, or just as a treat for you!

name: Royal Vale Vintage Teacup Candle in Coconut & Lime scent
description:
Here we have beautiful Royal Vale Vintage Teacup Candle with a lovely pattern of flowers, berries and fruits. A beautiful sight indeed!

This vintage teacup candle duo is available in the tropical Coconut and Lime fragrance and will burn for approximately 30 hours with proper trimming of the wick.

Soy wax burns cleanly and has a better scent throw than other waxes. It also cleans up with hot soapy water so you can re-use the vintage teacup once its finished filling your home with a beautiful scent.

Ideal for a gift, a wedding favour or centrepiece, or just as a treat for you!

name: November Vintage Teacup Candle in Green Tea & Lemongrass
description:
Here we have lovely European-made vintage teacup candle with "November" script in gold across the cup complimented by a delicate floral pattern.

This vintage teacup candle duo is available in the Green Tea & Lemongrass scent and will burn for approximately 30 hours with proper trimming of the wick.

Soy wax burns cleanly and has a better scent throw than other waxes. It also cleans up with hot soapy water so you can re-use the vintage teacup once its finished filling your home with a beautiful scent.

Ideal for a gift, a wedding favour or centrepiece, or just as a treat for you!
